Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Leviathan Drive, east of the Knightly Order.
Room.LongDescription: The Knightly Order of the White Cross is a large facility dedicated to the advanced training of honorable Paladins in their quest for truth and justice. The Order is funded primarily by the Paladins who are members, giving away most of their treasures to help other worthy Paladins advance in their ranks.
